title: Whatsapp+ v5.57C Cracked [=Rahil=] (Hide turn off last seen apk

Instructions

1) First backup your conversations by pressing OPTION button 
 Go to Settings>Chat settings>Backup Conversations

2) Then Uninstall OLDER WHATSAPP & Install [b]ONLY WA+[/b] apk ...

3) Click AGREE & CONTINUE

4) If you have BACKED UP your CHATS then there should be Restore BUTTON , PRESS IT

5) Wait it might take some long

6) Press Continue and then 

7) Press MENU button And You can see HIDE LAST SEEN button press it and BOOM ...(If you cant see that menu then goto PLUS=> 2. Main/chats screen =>Untick 2.3 HIDE STATUS MOD MENU)
